title:
Why do they mow the median strip of Carolina Beach Road (between Echo Farms and Monkey Junction) just as the wildflowers are blooming?  What a pity! Who does the mowing (County, DOT?). Why can\'t they wait a few weeks?  Why don\'t they plant trees in that large strip, like most cities do?

Thanks!
text:
DOT cuts that strip, and I'm not sure any schedule they adopt would
make everybody happy.
